name: New host LMS location
description: A new host LMS location has come to our attention

template.templateBody:
A new host LMS location {{item.location}} was submitted for a request into the system today. This host LMS location is not yet configured in your ReShare settings. If this host LMS location is not a requestable location in ReShare, please log into ReShare and set the 'Supplying Priority' for this profile to -1.

Thank you,
ReShare System Administrator

This is an auto-generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
